entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5 except low minus 9 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5 except low minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight except periods of snow over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
